summary: A collection of example CKAN extension plugins that demonstrate how to customize the dataset (package) creation and edit forms. The plugins provide utilities for handling package schemas, detecting fallback scenarios, enumerating supported package types, injecting additional metadata fields, rendering custom templates, accessing configuration, and optionally exposing Flask routes and countryâ€‘code helpers.
business_intent: Help CKAN developers and integrators quickly implement tailored dataset forms with custom fields and validation, enabling organizations to adapt CKAN to their specific data management requirements.
